description: MB3000-PH FT-IR Analyzer has an excellent signal-to-noise ratio and the advantage of a laboratory analyzer with the lowest cost of ownership, allowing users to operate the instrument without any planned maintenance within 10 years. The MB3000-PH is equipped with the new and intuitive Horizon MB FT-IR software, which is used to collect, process, and analyze spectra, and is very versatile.
name: MB3000-PH FT-IR Analyzer
